kw.name: Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://rocklov-julius-api.herokuapp.com/signup path_url=/signup headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '69', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "jose", "email": "jose@Jose.com.br", "password": "Jose@123"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
